TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content:
Just checked and it turns out I've got the same rep as Overfloater, don't know how that even happened.

Didn't think I would finally catch up with you, huh }:-]

Congratulations to vexx32 for becoming the latest member of the light green group!!

You deserve it!! Well done!!

I think the secret to a lot of rep is to make witty loading hints....

Congrats all!

Heh, for some. Most of mine comes from the Support section, but a fair whack comes from this very section, mostly from explaining various oddities of moderating to people. I must have written a few mini-essays in response to a fair few queries, heh.

They come up every now and again, for whatever reason...

Congratulations to Skyrender for becoming the latest member of the light green group!

(We'll need a bigger kitchen, what with all this crepe! )

I don't mean to get all sentimental now, but I always feel a little sad when I see that a familiar forum user has gone inactive. Just looking at that long gone date on their profile makes me think about the fleetingness of life, and stuff.

Congratulations to Skyrender for becoming the latest member of the light green group!

(We'll need a bigger kitchen, what with all this crepe! )

Well how about that. Only took me a little over 3 years, too. Seriously, though, good times.

Dangit, once again I was signed up for a secret club and never knew about it.

Last time I missed out on a whole year of cheese...

Glad to see Astropapi and Tw1 on the list too, love those guys.

Congratulations to KerrMu for becoming the latest member of the Light Green Group!!

You deserve it!!

Wow, thx

Not so sure I deserve this. IÃ‚Â´m just doing what I love.

(Do I have to wear light green blazers now or something? )

Cheers
Better; you get a light green laurel wreath!
Not to be rude, but I have not ever seen most of these people.

Not to be rude, but I have not ever seen most of these people.

That's kinda the point, the list is a "who's who" of high rep posters. Some of them were unfamiliar to me, too; the list in the OP explains why they seem to be popular.

It's not really all that important, but it is a bit of fun.

Edit for below: I suspect much of Camacha's rep is from being super helpful in the computer building thread, really knowledgeable about that stuff. Also a frequent poster in the Science Labs.

Edited December 23, 2014 by Red Iron Crown

Not to be rude, but I have not ever seen most of these people.

Ironically, I can say I've never seen you either lol. Unless you frequent general discussion/suggestions&development/games threads I never would.

Ironically, I can say I've never seen you either lol. Unless you frequent general discussion/suggestions&development/games threads I never would.

I dwell mostly in add-on development and releases, the space lounge (computer thread) and science forums. It seems a lot of people score loads of rep for building craft - something I do not consider too relevant.

Edit for below: I suspect much of Camacha's rep is from being super helpful in the computer building thread, really knowledgeable about that stuff. Also a frequent poster in the Science Labs.

You flatter me, but somehow I do not get rep for posts in that thread that often. Most of the rep seems to come from me taking a stance and people agreeing with me.
Congrats to Starwaster for making the cut.
Oooo so that's what the light green bars mean. Well, that and $3 will get me a cup of coffee I guess.

Look, Mom! I have a meme!

Light-Green Group has been updated. SQUAD and its associated accounts are still at the top of the list but are no longer numbered. In addition, I indicated which members of the community had two, three, four, five, or six light-green bars.

I'm number 12 on the forum right now. That's actually really scary.

Sorry for the wait.

Let me know if I missed anything! I'm sure that there's a typo or two that I may not have weaseled out

I'm number 12 on the forum right now. That's actually really scary.

Out of 130,000.... Scary indeed.

Merry light green group gnagna&gna 32 yup yup ik+ xDr

Edited December 25, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
some typo, surprising isn't it ;)

Hey Upsilon thanks for calling me clever

Could someone tell me how much light green pips are worth. I expected to get my second one after reaching 600 internet points.
They're worth 200 each. You get a new one at 700.

Green bars... I can buy?

Nobody know. It secret. I do favor. I pay good money.

Look, Mom! I have a meme!

Light-Green Group has been updated. SQUAD and its associated accounts are still at the top of the list but are no longer numbered. In addition, I indicated which members of the community had two, three, four, five, or six light-green bars.

I'm number 12 on the forum right now. That's actually really scary.

Sorry for the wait.

Let me know if I missed anything! I'm sure that there's a typo or two that I may not have weaseled out

Awesome, props to you for all the effort put into this list. And I'm honored to be number 14 (two months ago I wasn't even on the list )

Kerry Kristmas and Kappy Kaunakah to all!

Awesome, props to you for all the effort put into this list. And I'm honored to be number 14 (two months ago I wasn't even on the list )

Kerry Kristmas and Kappy Kaunakah to all!

I'm offended that you left out Festivus!
